post_info.post_title: Final Fantasy VII love triangle (spoiler alert)

It was areis she had that whole "hot blonde flower girl" thing goin on. Its a shame that she dies she was a good character. 
 Did you know that if you only talk to areis through out the whole game that you can take her out on a date towards the end before she dies. You can also do that with barret and tiffa.But im not sure if you can with yuffie. Anyway FF7 owns :D

Loki,
 What does your sig say????
 your very curious mother wants to know :)

It was areis she had that whole "hot blonde flower girl" thing goin on. Its a shame that she dies she was a good character. 

 
 I don't understand people who dislike her. A friend of mine who wanted the Tifa date was annoyed by all the opportunities to raise Aeris' affection quota. And I guess I got creeped out when Aeris wouldn't let Cloud leave her home. But she has so many redeeming qualities.
 
 
Did you know that if you only talk to areis through out the whole game that you can take her out on a date towards the end before she dies. You can also do that with barret and tiffa.But im not sure if you can with yuffie. Anyway FF7 owns :D

 
 Yep. You can date Yuffie, too, but nothing meaningful really happens compared to the dialogue in Aeris' and Tifa's dates.
 
 I've read about Cloud and Yuffie. It's interesting. Maybe if she was a bit older...
